targets.expr:
count by (nodegroup, namespace) (
  kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running",namespace=~"[[namespace]]", nodegroup=~"[[nodeGroup]]"} * on (namespace, pod)
  group_left(nodegroup)
  (
    kube_pod_info * on (node)
    group_left(nodegroup)
    label_replace(kube_node_labels, "nodegroup", "$1", "label_alpha_eksctl_io_nodegroup_name", "(.*)")
  )
)

panels.title: Utilization of requested CPU  by namespace
Utilization of requested memory by namespace

targets.expr:
1 - (sum by (label_eks_amazonaws_com_nodegroup) (
  kube_pod_container_resource_requests_cpu_cores * on (node)
  group_left(label_eks_amazonaws_com_nodegroup) kube_node_labels
)
/
sum by (label_eks_amazonaws_com_nodegroup) (
	kube_node_status_capacity_cpu_cores * on (node)
	group_left(label_eks_amazonaws_com_nodegroup) kube_node_labels
))

panels.title: CPU capacity requested by node group

targets.expr:
1- (sum by (label_eks_amazonaws_com_nodegroup) (
  kube_pod_container_resource_requests_memory_bytes * on (node)
  group_left(label_eks_amazonaws_com_nodegroup) kube_node_labels
)
/
sum by (label_eks_amazonaws_com_nodegroup) (
	kube_node_status_capacity_memory_bytes * on (node)
	group_left(label_eks_amazonaws_com_nodegroup) kube_node_labels
))

panels.title: Memory capacity requested by node group

targets.expr:
sum by (label_eks_amazonaws_com_nodegroup) (
  kube_pod_container_resource_requests_cpu_cores * on (node)
  group_left(label_eks_amazonaws_com_nodegroup) kube_node_labels
)
/
sum by (label_eks_amazonaws_com_nodegroup) (
	kube_node_status_capacity_cpu_cores * on (node)
	group_left(label_eks_amazonaws_com_nodegroup) kube_node_labels
)

panels.title: Unused CPU capacity by node group
Time blocked by CFS queue (above k8s CPU limit)

targets.expr: sum by (namespace, pod, container) (rate(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_seconds_total{container!="", container!="POD", namespace=~"[[namespace]]"}[10m])) > 0
